contentList.content: Silver Shortsword of the Astral Plane
A variation of the legendary psionic Greatsword gifted to the most honorable and accomplished Githyanki. This variant better suits warriors who fight with agility and finesse, instead of sheer might.
Silver Longsword of the Astral Plane
A variation of the legendary psionic Greatsword gifted to the most honorable and accomplished Githyanki. This variant better suits warriors who fight with agility and finesse, instead of sheer might.
Transform the Silver Sword of the Astral Plane into other forms.
Transforms the Silver Sword of the Astral Plane into a shortsword.
Transforms the Silver Sword of the Astral Plane into a longsword.
Transforms the Silver Sword of the Astral Plane into a greatsword.
